refnamediv.refpurpose: Return array entries that match the pattern

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: preg_grep returns the array consisting of the elements of the input array that match the given pattern.

Since PHP 4.0.4, the results returned by preg_grep are indexed using the keys from the input array. If this behavior is undesirable, use array_values on the array returned by preg_grep to reindex the values.

example.title: preg_grep example
example.programlisting:
<?php
// return all array elements
// containing floating point numbers
$fl_array = preg_grep("/^(\d+)?\.\d+$/", $array);
?>
